.. py:data:: GO_IDS_PATH

   

.. py:data:: GO_PATH_dre

   

.. py:data:: GO_PATH_dreM

   

.. py:data:: GO_PATH_hsa

   

.. py:data:: GO_BASIC_URL
   :value: 'http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/go/go-basic.obo'

   

.. py:data:: GO_ZFIN_URL
   :value: 'https://current.geneontology.org/annotations/zfin.gaf.gz'

   

.. py:data:: GO_NCBI_URL
   :value: 'https://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gene/DATA/gene2go.gz'

   

.. py:function:: get_genes_in_GO_concept(concept_id, organism, gene_id_type=None)

   gene_id_type: the desired gene id type to be returned


.. py:function:: id_exists_given_organism(concept_id, organism)


.. py:function:: check_id_format(id)


.. py:function:: is_numeric(value)


.. py:function:: build_all()


.. py:function:: _build_GO_IDs(GO_BASIC_URL, GO_IDS_PATH)

   This function generates a list of all GO IDs, the Name of GO IDs, and the
   ontology it belongs to. This is downloaded directly from the GO website using
   the GO API.


.. py:function:: _add_to_GO_IDs()

   the purpose of this function is to add on two columns to identify if
   the GO concept exists for zebrafish and himans.


.. py:function:: _build_zebrafish_GO()


.. py:function:: _build_human_GO()


.. py:function:: _build_dre_mapped_GO()


.. py:function:: _get_ontology(namespace)


.. py:function:: _process_GOBasic_content(content: list) -> list


.. py:function:: _write_GOBasic_to_file(go_terms: list, output_file: str) -> None
